Text:
If you will found something wrong just write comment, if ewerything ok just give thanks.
It took me long time to colect ewery isue. SO DONT BE RUDE AND SEED TUIS COLLECTION.
No one is seeding...why bother to upload a huge file if you don't plan on seeding it!!!
No offense, but some of these are in Russian.  (Futurama/Simpsons Crisis I part 2, for example) Art quality is very good, though.

Here i add fix for that:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7880642

If you will found any mistakes more just write me.

Hi again, thanks for that upload to replace the Russian copy.  Here's the problem, even though it's not your fault.  The next to last page of the english pdf of Crossover I pt 2 is a two page graphic that doesn't quite mesh up due to a bad scan.  However the Russian one has the image complete as one picture.  It's a nitpick, was hoping your english pdf fixed this, but alas, it did not.  Appreciate you hard work.  Hopefully  I'll have gotten the complete batch of files in a day or so.  I've a rotten connection.  Thanks again.
